outputs.output_descr:
The project supports the efforts of the Government of Egypt to improve the quality of life for its citizens in urban areas and is designed to:

1- To increase access to quality health care through the establishment of a model Family Health Center (FHC) in the district of Shubra. 

2- To promote participatory local development in the same area through building the capacity of local NGOs, enhancing local governance and promoting ICT for local development. This will be achieved through strengthening the capacity of local institutions in participatory planning and development

The innovation of this project is to enhance the quality of services provided by the FHC through establishing linkages between the FHC and the social and community development in addition to strengthening the partnership between the Ministry of Health and the NGOs.

project_descr:
Participatory and Integrated Health and Urban Social Development (HUSD)

.
